Offshore Development Center

The Offshore Development Center (ODC) is a popular business model that acts as an extension to your own team and infrastructure in Ukraine, where we provide you with fully dedicated team of IT talents that match your requirement.

How Copler can help you?

The main advantages
of our ODC model:

  • Optimize your operations costs by as much as 70% (based on our analysis of running price levels for certain types of experts in US, UK, Israel and Canada).

  • We reduce your initial system setup and overheads cost in terms of office rent, hardware, software and administration.

  • We are completely removing your labor relationship issues from your daily operations. We handle your team's scaling up or down with average time to full capacity from 1 to 4 weeks.

  • 4-6 weeks from initial request to on boarding.

Some of our technologies:

 

  • Tomcat
  • HAProxy
  • Cloud (AWS, Azure)
  • Clustering
  • LAMP
  • Web
  • JavaScript
  • Angular JS
  • Mobile (IOS, Android)
  • Responsive Design
  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • UI/UX
  • BigData
  • Business Intelligence
  • MySQL, PostgreSQL, Percona, Oracle, MS SQL
  • MangoDB
  • PHP
  • C#/.NET
  • Node JS
  • Ruby on Rails (RoR)
  • Java and Java EE
  • Pyton
  • Perl
  • C/C++

Our rates include

 

  • Salaries and taxes
  • Night shift compensation, on-call duties compensation
  • IT infrastructure support
  • Overheads (office, workplace, telephony, payroll, IT, help desk, HR, perks)
  • Training and quality control
  • Full labour legislation compliance, IP protection

Financial Model

We use a transparent cost plus rates for our service, where client could negotiate staff salaries, and we add our constant administration fee on top of that.
